casebody.data:
COBB v. GEORGIA. No. 51,

Misc.

Decided October 9, 1967. Jack Greenberg, James M. Nabrit III, Michael Melts-ner and Howard Moore, Jr., for petitioner. Arthur K. Bolton, Attorney General of Georgia, G. Ernest Tidwell, Executive Assistant Attorney General, Marion 0. Gordon, Assistant Attorney General, and George D. Lawrence, Solicitor' General, for respondent. Per Curiam.

The motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and the petition for a writ of certiorari are granted. The judgment is reversed. Whitus v. Georgia, 385 U. S. 545.
